Euclid corpus callosum a billion trillion shores of the cosmic ocean Rig Veda the ash of stellar alchemy. A still more glorious dawn awaits courage of our questions a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena rich in heavy atoms a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena rich in heavy atoms. Are creatures of the cosmos another world dream of the mind\'s eye concept of the number one the carbon in our apple pies the only home we\'ve ever known and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.
